Today, the Hebrides are lighting up with 7 ft @10s NW swell and fresh 15 mph SW winds. Europie and Barvas are your top picks, especially during their prime tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 7 ft @9s WNW swell and fresh 21 mph WSW winds, making it blown out across the board. Day after, we see a slight improvement with 6 ft @11s WSW swell and moderate 17 mph SW winds, still best at sheltered spots like Europie and Barvas. Best: today.
